SELECT
FROM oa_leave a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.apply_id LIKE '%'||#{apply.id}||'%' '%'+#{apply.id}+'%' concat('%',#{apply.id},'%')
AND a.apply_name LIKE '%'||#{apply.name}||'%' '%'+#{apply.name}+'%' concat('%',#{apply.name},'%')
AND a.status LIKE '%'||#{status}||'%' '%'+#{status}+'%' concat('%',#{status},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
